These waterproof and accident repellent table skirts are an ideal way to cover unsightly table legs and bring a classy look to your tables. Pair our stylish table skirts with our plain or colored table covers to complete your party table. We offer these durable, disposable and upscale quality plastic table skirts to solve the budgetary challenges usually faced by professional party planners and organizers.

[Information]

Efavormart.com provides you the elegant disposable plastic collection of party supplies that will make your event look remarkably sophisticated and well-hosted. The seamless shine and glossy surface of these top-quality plastic supplies mimic the charisma of real china. Transform your conventional dining experience into an elegant affair with the classy serving bowls fashioned in contemporary curved designs and chic square shape. The strong and sturdy material handles the piping hot soups, chilled desserts, creamy cakes and other treats without spilling or leaking. The attribute of disposability makes the cleanup time a breeze for any occasion.

 

Additional Information:

  • WARNING: Not microwave and dishwasher safe
  • All sizes are approximate measurements
  • Perfect for wedding, birthday, upscale occasions, and any special events

[Information]

Indulge your guests in the sweet ecstasy of merriment and jubilancy by serving succulent desserts and refreshing appetizers in these classy quadrangular Mini Plastic Appetizer Plates. The chic rectangular shape and transparent plastic material will instantly enhance the tempting lure of your dishes. 

These Disposable Dessert Plates are specially crafted from premium quality plastic, which makes them a perfect choice for indoor/outdoor events, birthday parties, weddings, baby/bridal showers, tasting events, buffets, banquets, or other catered functions. 

These splendid plates combine the convenience of plastic with the appealing look that mimics the crystal glass. The attribute of disposability makes the tidying up time a breeze. These classy plates help in bringing out the true beauty of desserts, appetizers, and other small portions of delightful treats. Serve small slices of cakes, mini muffins, little appetizer, small sandwiches, and other scrumptious delicacies.

Additional Information:

  • Perfect for wedding, birthday, upscale occasions, and any special events
  • Not Microwave or Dishwasher Safe
